title: Enjoy watching movies?
subTitle: What about nominating your favourite movies and making them win the awards that they truly deserve!!

title: So, What is Rate-It??
subTitle: Rate-It is your new host for the Grand People's Choice Movie Award Show!! Its time for you people to start nominating your favourite movies , to make it to the top of the leaderboard!!

title: Remember each vote counts!
subTitle: You can make only 5 nominations per movie so nominate accordingly!

title: Make your vote fast!!
subTitle: Make sure that your most loved movie ends in the top 10 to be eligible for the award night , share the link with other people too and spread the word!!
